description: create a manifest to use in a deploy or retrieve operation from a sourcepath or list of metadata

flags.manifesttype: a pre defined list of manifest types designed to be used with salesforce APIs
flags.manifestname: the name of the manifest to create
flags.outputdir: the location to save the manifest
flags.sourcepath: comma-separated list of source file paths to create a manifest from
flags.manifest: comma-separated list of metadata component names to create a manifest from
